data.eml:eml: Korean species of the genus Neoperla Needham, 1905 (Plecoptera: Perlidae) *

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Murányi, Dávid, Li, Weihai, Jeon, Mi Jeong, Hwang, Jeong Mi, Seo, Hong Yul (2015): Korean species of the genus Neoperla Needham, 1905 (Plecoptera: Perlidae) *. Zootaxa 3918 (1): 113-127, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3918.1.5
